intro.p: In July 2025, a coalition of local governments surveyed 1,300 urban residents in {{state_1}}, {{state_2}} and {{state_3}} about home readiness for extreme heat.The survey was conducted in English and {{language}}.
Survey respondents were asked to what degree they agreed with the following statements, using a 5-point scale: “Strongly Agree,” “Agree,” “Neutral,” “Disagree,” or “Strongly Disagree.”

item.p: Because the negligent and incompetent government has repeatedly failed to take meaningful action on the worsening climate crisis, I’ve been forced to spend my own hard-earned money to prepare my home for the increasingly deadly and unrelenting heat.
My corrupt and indifferent city government blatantly ignores vulnerable, low-income communities and refuses to provide adequate protections against the escalating threat of extreme heat.
